title: Heritage of Britain: Great Moments in the Story of an Island Race
description: Reminders of our national heritage lie all around us. Castles and cathedrals, personal relics, souvenirs and stately homes - all have played a part in our island story. Such relics provide the inspiration for this book, each one acting as a 'talisman' to form a living link with the past.
author: Reader's Digest Association
